guardian.title: Greece gets lifeline as ECB agrees â‚¬3.3bn extra emergency funds
guardian.topComment: Lasting damage? Give us a break. The lasting damage is from the austerity measures. And if Greece doesn't manage to renegotiate the conditions attached to the bailout moneys the damage will be eternal. Don't blink Greece.

guardian.title: Jeb Bush backs brother's NSA surveillance program 'to keep us safe'
guardian.topComment: This comment makes a lot more sense when you realise that we are not included in the "us" he's referring to.

guardian.title: Google warns of US government 'hacking any facility' in the world
guardian.topComment: Google already has unfettered global access to vast amounts of private information by opening everyones emails everyday, so not sure they can play the moral high ground on this one.
